meaningMnemonic: With <vocabulary>待ち</vocabulary> you know you're waiting, but what's a <vocabulary>ぼうけ</vocabulary>? Turns out it's the long version of ボケ which means idiot. Basically, in this case you're a waiting idiot. Why? because you were <vocabulary>stood up</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: The reading for 待ち comes right from 待つ. You know the drill by now.
